price: Mola wangu Mlezi! Nitunukie hukumu na uniunganishe na watendao mema.
arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: Ibrahim a.s. akasema kwa kuomba: Mola wangu Mlezi! Nitunukie ukamilifu wa ilimu na vitendo, ili nipate kustahili kuubeba Ujumbe wako na hukummu kwa waja wako, na niwezeshe niungane pamoja na kundi la watendao wema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥuk'man wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
